Regards,

Date: Friday, 4/21/1991
Subject: Shane Halter healing process
Shane Halter is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Kyle Abbott
Dear Sir,
Kyle Abbott is doing pretty good at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 2.41, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/2/1991
Subject: Progress of Eric Wedge
Dear Sir,
Eric Wedge has an AVG of .275 at AA New Britain Red Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/15/1991
Subject: Progress of Lou Pote
Dear Sir,
Lou Pote has nothing more to prove at A Round Rock Express!
He has an ERA of 1.27 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
